title: Disconnected from a game. Anyone experienced the same?
body: So after the ISPs have been fixed (Dodo, iPrimus, etc.), I decided to play a game and I've just disconnected again for no apparent reason or at least I think so. I was wondering if anyone with Dodo or iPrimus has experienced the same issue. I'm currently unable to connect to servers, because it disconnected me whilst in a game.

replies.body:
> Hi all,

>Tonight we'll be performing a brief network maintenance to remove one of our peering partners at 1am AEDT. Players on iiNet, Spark, Dodo, iPrimus and potentially other ISPs are likely to experience a brief disconnect from games in progress around that time.

>This is a follow-up from last nights issues, and will allow the partner to perform maintenance to their network to prevent it happening in the future.

>Please keep an eye on this thread and the server status page for any updates.

>Cheers
Mindstar

[source](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/yWTUfB8G-live-network-maintenance-1am-aedt-2nd-april)
